UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 4.2: UNICEF staff and partners are provided tools, guidance and resources for effective communication on children’s issues with stakeholders

description.narrative: In 2020, UNICEF Iran increased incredibly the level of public and media advocacy and awareness-raising for children, specially on COVID-19, by reaching out to millions in the public, media and other decision-makers and building their capacity through feeding the digital platforms and other events. In 2020, the programmes of Partnership and Resource Mobilization section are focused on addressing the needs of the most vulnerable children at the time of COVID-19 through “Child Friendly Cities” and “Innovations for Children in Iran” Initiatives as well as leveraging the support of private sector partners including Chambers of Commerce and corporates. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:26/08/2020

title.narrative: Increased number of platforms supported to foster innovations for children
Number of new partnerships including private partners and networks established with relevant stakeholders.
Number of people reached through UNICEF information publications and leaflets, i.e UNICEF in Iran, CRC, fact-sheets.
Number of media citations of UNICEF statements, press releases, interviews, speeches, etc
Number of people reached through UNICEF Iran website and social media platforms
